Text.Page:
You going out there?

Our volunteer scout, Jabran, is overdue. I sent him to find the leader of the runekeepers.

Little hairball's probably dead, so his mission's yours. Find and kill the head runekeeper.

And if you find Jabran's body, bring it back here.

Hey! You down from Blackspring? I was on the way back there when I ran across these ghostly horrors here. Stopped to take a look.

Hah! I knew Selia was sweet on me! Almost feel guilty makin' her worry.

Almost.
